author: The Feed
title: Tough for Americans? Elon Musk says if Trump wins U.S elections there will be temporary hardship for all
description: In a dramatic turn for the 2024 U.S. presidential race, Tesla CEO Elon Musk, who has invested over $130 million to support Donald Trump’s campaign, has warned that a Trump victory may bring “temporary hardship” for Americans.
content:
